verses.name: Psalms 62:6
verses.text: He only is my rock and my salvation: he is my defence; I shall not be moved.

verses.name: Psalms 62:7
verses.text: In God is my salvation and my glory: the rock of my strength, and my refuge, is in God.

verses.name: Psalms 62:8
verses.text: Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 62:9
verses.text: Surely men of low degree are vanity, and men of high degree are a lie: to be laid in the balance, they are altogether lighter than vanity.
